title: Social Distance Lift, Prince Anniversary, Shirley's Chili and more.
itunes:title: Social Distance Lift, Prince Anniversary, Shirley's Chili and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! It's sunshine and blue skies for Big Dog. Junior visited Steve and had to maintain 6ft distance, plus more. The crew are being critical of what is happening in Florida and Georgia. Today is the death anniversary of Prince. Apollonia is feuding with Shiela E. What lies have you told during the quarantine in order to avoid talking to someone. The Chief Love Officer addresses cleanliness and familiarity. Are there activities pre-quarantine that you didn't like doing but wish you could right now? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has an important message surrounding your health and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
